title: The Restaurant at The Dolder Grand awarded The Culture Trip’s Zurich Local Favourite Award 2015
text:
The Restaurant at The Dolder Grand awarded The Culture Trip’s Zurich Local Favourite Award 2015 The Restaurant at The Dolder Grand awarded The Culture Trip’s Zurich Local Favourite Award 2015 Details Category: Switzerland Created on Monday, 19 October 2015 09:45 The Restaurant at The Dolder Grand, Zurich, has been awarded The Culture Trip’s Zurich Local Favourite Award 2015. Passionate about placing the Swiss capital in the global spotlight, the awards showcase the best of Zurich’s culinary scene, from traditional wine houses, to elegant Michelin starred eateries. 
Under the watchful eye of Chef Fine Dining, Heiko Nieder, The Restaurant offers fresh and innovative gourmet cuisine, boasting 18 GaultMillau points and two Michelin stars. The five-course lunch and eight-course dinner menus bring Nieder’s flavourful mastery to life, showcasing modern Swiss interpretations and classic European cuisine. In 2014, Heiko Nieder was awarded Le Grand Chef du Guide Bleu' by Guide Bleu, and 'BestGerman Chef abroad' by GaultMillau Germany. The Culture Trip is a global platform for local culture, showcasing international art, food, travel and design, offering a hand-picked selection of cultural sights, read by discerning travellers, culturists and foodies around the world. Located between the vibrant Zurich and the Alpine forests, the Dolder Grand enjoys panoramic views of the city, the lake and the Alps. The hotel comprises 176 luxurious rooms and suits within the historic main building, award-winning spa and Golf wings, two restaurants and a bar. Related articles
